title: Office Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California
Interview Descriptions: Materials provided in advance. Interview was fair and comprehensive and introduced to department personnel. Staff dressed business casual and in logo shirts and jackets. Everyone was very nice and helpful to me.
Interview Questions: Why did I want to work there?

title: Social Media Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California
Interview Descriptions: I had a great experience! All the hiring managers are nice and willing to listen. You can tell they care about what you have to say and will take you into consideration.
Interview Questions: What are you looking for in this position?

title: Student Work Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California
Interview Descriptions: A fairly easy and quick process that involved one stage of interviews. Explaining previous work history. The conversation was really laidback and the manager was easy to talk to. The conversation stems away about the job and getting to know more about yourself.
Interview Questions: What is your strengths and weaknesses

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California
Interview Descriptions:
awesome process. so friendly. i am glad to have joined such a wonderful organization. i would recommend this company to anyone. 
the interview was straight to the point and none of the "silly questions " i usually endure

title: Student Ambassador Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: Very simple process. Two rounds, one with current student ambassadors and another with faculty members. Easy questions just to get to know you. Just show off your good personality and you are sure to do well.
Interview Questions: Name a time where you faced adversity.

title: Admissions Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California
Interview Descriptions: Applied via website. Contacted 1 month later for first interview, but process moved quickly after that. First, phone interview with manager. Second, team interview with colleagues and manager. Taken to lunch (which is a really nice gesture, and also functions as an informal interview).
Interview Questions: I was mostly asked behavioral and scenario based questions. I have gaps in my employment, so I was asked about that.

title: Lifeguard Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California (Moraga, CA) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: Very easy to communicate over email with my interview panel. I felt heard and they took all my request and questions seriously. Also very clear with the expectations and how much I would be paid.
Interview Questions: What do you do in your free time?

title: Assistant Athletic Trainer Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California (New Orleans, LA) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: Apply after checked the company name through Indeed. Then followed the direction the company gives. Then, the interview was notified by a texting to my phone. And the interview was immediately set up.
Interview Questions: About myself other than described on resume.

title: Student Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California (Moraga, CA)
Interview Descriptions: First an application had to filed out and submitted in person. I dropped off my application, my resume, and a letter of recommendation. A couple of days later, I received an email with information regarding the interview schedule. They were flexible and I was able to come in at a convenient time. It was a group interview with two of the current supervisors. They asked me a couple of basic interview questions. They told me they were hiring for the spring semester. During the January term I received the offer and I began my training.
Interview Questions: What's your favorite book/what are you currently reading?

title: Orientation Leader Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California (Moraga, CA) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: You must first fill out an application, then, if application is complete with no holds you will be invited to a group interview. From there, if you perform well, you will be invited to an individual interview. Then, if the right fit for the position, you will be selected
Interview Questions: Tell us about a time you have dealt with adversity. What did you do?

title: Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California (Moraga, CA) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Very nice. They were flexible with my schedule. Phone screen before an actual interview.  Interview was relaxed and very professional.  In the end, it didn't work out, but they were very professional throughout the process.  No hard feelings!
Interview Questions: How would I represent the college's mission?

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California
Interview Descriptions: I saw the on line job advertisement and I applied it. After a couple of weeks, I got a chance to have an interview. Then I was hired. My salary was 8$/ hour to 10 $ per hour.

title: Instructor Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California (Moraga, CA) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: Called me from out of the blue to fill in for an instructor who had walked off the job.
Interview Questions: Not applicable - got hired on the spot because of desperation.

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California (Moraga, CA) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions: 1) 20 minute phone interview with hiring manager. 2) 30 minute 'skype-like' interview with hiring committee. 3) Half day in person interview- 1 hour with hiring manager, 1 hour with department, 1 hour with student committee, 1 hour with campus wide constituents, lunch with hiring manager.
Interview Questions: How will you innovate in this role?

title: Student Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California (Moraga, CA) in Oct 2012
Interview Descriptions: I got an initial phone screening, a second phone call with the Associate Dean and was then invited for an in person interview.  There were  people from different teams represented who took turns asking questions.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in five years? Where do you see yourself in ten years?

title: Student Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California (Moraga, CA) in Jan 2011
Interview Descriptions: Because I have a background in Fine Art and worked for a Design Studio's Art Gallery exhibit on Ancient Egypt I was hired at the first interview.  My previous work experience and work as an Artist enabled me to find familiarity in my surroundings at work easily.  My experience in the computer department was very stimulating and interesting.  I learned about IT management and was able to pass a Civil Service test for IT Management in addition to the computer skills that I learned.
Interview Questions: The interview questions were mainly about my work experience and my availability.  After working there for two-years (2004-2006) I continued working a few months beyond graduation in 2004/2006.

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California (Moraga, CA) in Apr 2010
Interview Descriptions: Had a quick 30 min to an hour interview. They asked questions about my experience and my availability during the summer as we were being hired to set up and help with summer events at the college. They worked around my other job and offered my coworker another job with the college at the end of the summer. It was all relatively easy.

title: Tutor Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at St. Mary's College of California (Moraga, CA) in Jan 2009
Interview Descriptions: Showed up and they hired me no questions asked
Interview Questions: Why do you want this job
